Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: found the 8 gb high resolution to work good for my needs. Droped it on a concrete and knocked the usb losewhich losend the pin hole camers. super glued back in place. works fine now. not bad for the money orderd two more

ProductInfo.Features:
Video Format: 640*480 High Resolution with 30 fps
Picture Format: 1280*960 pixels resolution in JPEG format
Web Cam: for instant messaging, instant photo and video sharing over internet. Flash Drive: For easy transfer & storage of electronic files
Battery: High Capacity Polymer Li-in Battery for about 1 hour of recording with sound
Executive Pen Styling with smooth, ball-point pen writing functionality (black ink.)
ProductInfo.Name: High Resolution Pen Shape Digital Video Camera Recorder with Pen Function - 8GB - Black with Gold Accent
